channel.title: Display text on an interface?
channel.description:
I've never coded a command to display text on the player's screen, but I want to display text on a Blank Scroll interface. I have the command bring up the scroll, but I am clueless on how to add text to it. Can someone help please? Thanks!
This is all i've got so far... [code] if (command[0].equals("commandlist")) { ActionSender.sendInterface(player, 116); //Open Command List }[/code]
I was looking through some other codes and tried to use this, but I am unsure on how to use it. [code]Object[] params = new Object[] { "", "", "", "", "Offer", -1, 0, 7, 4, 93, 7012370 };[/code] (It seems to make an object on the screen, but i honestly don't know.)
Can someone assist me please? Thanks!!! :)
Client Revision:637

item.title: Display text on an interface?
item.dc:creator: @Rolling_Stone Rolling Stone
item.description:
@Rolling_Stone wrote:

I’ve never coded a command to display text on the player’s screen, but I want to display text on a Blank Scroll interface.
I have the command bring up the scroll, but I am clueless on how to add text to it. Can someone help please? Thanks!

This is all i’ve got so far…

if (command[0].equals("commandlist")) { ActionSender.sendInterface(player, 116); //Open Command List }

I was looking through some other codes and tried to use this, but I am unsure on how to use it.

Object[] params = new Object[] { "", "", "", "", "Offer", -1, 0, 7, 4, 93, 7012370 };
(It seems to make an object on the screen, but i honestly don’t know.)

Can someone assist me please? Thanks!!!
